post.author: 정재용
post.content:
안녕하세요..

저는 Coska멤버인 Andrew Jung 이라고 합니다.
다름이 아니라 저희 회사에서 Intermediate Unix Administrator를 뽑기에 여기 coska에 올립니다. 제가 같은 position으로 일하고 있는데여..
정말 일하기 좋은환경과 급여및보너도 좋구여.. 안정적이라 나이에상관없이 retire하기전까지 일할수 있습니다. 아래의 기술은 가지신분은 저에게 멜을 보내주세여 물론 영어루 의사소통이 자유로우서야 되구여.. 기술두 겸비하세야 합니다. 소개하는 저의 입장을 생각해주시면요..
저의 멜은 jyblues@hotmail.com이구여 일루 10월 13일 전까지 Resume를 보내주시면 됩니다.

POSITION:                Intermediate Unix Administrator (Ref. #237)

REPORTING TO:         Manager, IT Infrastructure



As a member of the Information Technology Group, your primary focus will be to provide technical support and administration for corporate systems and servers.

Key Responsibilities:

Identification of key skills:

·A solid Unix background with 3+ years of Unix administration in a Sun
Solaris and Red Hat Linux environment.  Windows NT Server Knowledge isrequired.

·Thorough understanding of storage technologies, SAN and NAS devices, file systems and volume management, including RAID, Fiber channel, etc.

·History of automating of day-to-day processing. Techniques should include implementation of 3rd party solutions, shell scripting and associated documentation.

·Understanding of DNS, NIS and overall network troubleshooting.

.Education And Skill Requirements:

· Computer Science degree with 5 yrs of Unix related experience.
· Administration experience with directory services, send mail and
  calendar servers.
· Experience with backup software, specifically Legato and Veritas
  products.
· Project management and experience using MS Project required.
· Knowledge of Unix and TCP/IP security.
· Excellent problem solving skills and strong communication skills are
  required.
· Experience with MS Office products.
post.title: Intermediate Unix Administrator !!
